info.title: Voice Calls OpenAPI Documentation
info.description: All the available endpoints in one place.

post.description: Login by email, password

requestBody.description: Pass in phone number for the user, as well as desired type (customer or listener)

post.description: Verify phone number by entering code received

post.summary: Resend verification code to phone number
post.description: Resend verification code by providing user's phone number
Log out from system and delete current access token
Updates your own profile
Updates your current status to either 'online', 'on-call' or 'offline'

get.description: Returns data about specified user by ID

post.summary: Update your current device token for app
post.description: Update current device token depending on which application is used: customer or listener app. Available 'type' is 'customer' or 'listener'

get.summary: Show all listeners that are currently online
get.description: Show online listeners and optionally filter them by topic.

200.description: Successful response (as Laravel resource, includes pagination)

post.summary: Online listeners by topic and languages
post.description: Show all listeners that are currently online who speak one of the languages and are subscribed to a topic.
Login by email, password

message.example: There has been an error while trying to authenticated. Try again.

post.description: Send password reset link to e-mail address provided

requestBody.description: Enough to just provide e-mail address for your account

message.example: E-mail with password reset link has been sent!
User who's password you are trying to request to reset, is not an admin

get.summary: Show currently signed in admin profile info

post.summary: Update currently signed in admin profile info

delete.summary: Log-out any other devices signed into current account

requestBody.description: You have to approve this action by providing current password

message.example: Other devices have been unauthorized successfully!

post.summary: Create a new user in the system

200.description: Successful response (as Laravel resource, includes pagination)

post.description: You can cancel call that's incoming (as listener) or end the call before it's picked up by listener (as customer)

post.summary: Refresh channel token for each participant
post.description: After initial/current channel token expires, each user regenerates their token to be able to stay in call
Report bad behavior during conversation

comment.example: I am not happy with the way this conversation was full of racial slurs!

sender: Sender can be either caller or listener.
conversation_id: The conversation id field is required.

post.summary: Set time check_time of provided conversation id.
post.description: Set time check_time of provided conversation id.

get.summary: Show all transactions with current user
get.description: Show all transactions with current user,can be filtered with dates.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for filter. From where to start to search.

post.description: Attach topics to current user.

requestBody.description: U can provide array of id's what shoud attached to user

post.description: Finish all conversation of user,can be included exception id's

requestBody.description: U can provide array of id's what shoud be ignored,to finish them.

post.description: Change current user type(listener,customer)

post.description: Withdraw amount of money from users balance with checks.

post.summary: Returns data of calls of time period.
post.description: Returns data of calls of time period.

get.summary: Returns all datas of reports with different filters
get.description: Returns all datas of reports with different filters

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Your can provide sort option to all comming datas : 'time'

parameters.name: userMadeReport
parameters.description: U can provide id of user who made reports. And ull get return datas only with this user.

parameters.name: userGotReported
parameters.description: U can provide id of user who getting reports. And ull get return datas only with this user.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: U can provide date,in what date u whatnt to see reports.

listener.bio: Illum omnis distinctio maxime error officiis debitis.

get.summary: Returns all calls datas with different filters
get.description: Returns all calls datas with different filters

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Your can provide filter option to all comming datas in: finished,cancelled,on-going,requested

parameters.name: caller
parameters.description: U can provide id of user. And ull get return datas only with this user in caller role.

parameters.name: listener
parameters.description: U can provide id of user. And ull get return datas only with this user in listener role.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: U can provide start date of all incomming records.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: U can provide end date of all incomming records.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Your can provide sort option to all comming datas in: status,duration,started_at

caller.bio: Minus qui sit nulla quidem reprehenderit aut est.

listener.bio: Qui ipsa rerum fugit deleniti magni possimus sit.

get.summary: Returns datas of users - > with filters and search option and sort options
get.description: Returns datas of users - > with filters and search option and sort options

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Your can provide filter option to all incomming datas in: customer,listener

parameters.name: searchName
parameters.description: U can provide search name ,that will be filtered and bring back datas like this name.

parameters.name: searchPhone
parameters.description: U can provide search phone ,that will be filtered and bring back datas like this phone.

parameters.name: searchEmail
parameters.description: U can provide search email ,that will be filtered and bring back datas like this email.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: U can provide order/sort type,with all datas will be sorted and returned back. in:type | full_name | phone_number | email | rating | created_at | balance | date_of_birth | succesfull_calls | total_time

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: Your can provide order type -> in: desc,asc ( WORKS ONLY IF 'ORDER' SPECIFIED)

get.summary: Returns datas of current user - > all datas from all resourec (calls,transactions)
get.description: Returns datas of current user - > all datas from all resourec (calls,transactions)
